name: Stationery Physics
description:
Carry the marble to its destination by arranging stationery!

Game is best experienced in Fullscreen Mode 

*If the screen turns red when selecting the pen, make sure the itch.io grey bars are out of the way before clicking and dragging :)

CREDITS 

MUSIC 학교 앞 문방구 Stationery Shop in front of School by 일상공감 Daily Sympathy

SOUND EFFECTS mixkit.co & freegameart.org
